where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( guac <* global_uncertainty_assigned_context | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u1 <* guac.uncertainty | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u2 <* guac.uncertainty | u2.name = u1.name ) ) >1 ) ) >0 ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( uar <* uncertainty_assigned_representation | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u1<* uar.uncertainty | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u2 <* uar.uncertainty | u2.name = u1.name ) ) >1 ) ) >0 ) ) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( qri <* qualified_representation_item | SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u1 <* qri.qualifiers | (schema_name + '.UNCERTAINTY_QUALIFIER' IN TYPEOF ( u1 ) ) AND ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( u2 <* qri.qualifiers | ( schema_name + '.UNCERTAINTY_QUALIFIER' IN TYPEOF ( u2 ) ) AND ( u2\uncertainty_qualifier.measure_name = u1\uncertainty_qualifier.measure_name ) ) ) >1 ) ) ) >0 ) ) = 0
